InfoReplace:
false FC4 Open World: Skill unlocker
Unlocks Signature Weapons in the shop
Changes made by this mod: [list] [*] All requirements for unlocking skills (like "Complete this mission" or "Reach this Arena rank") have been removed. All skills are now available from the start. [/list]
Other Information: [list] [*] This mod is part of jvarnes' Open World Mod. [*] This mod is co-op friendly. [/list]
[size=1][color=lightgreen]Author: [/color][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/users/1251163][b]jvarnes[/b][/url][/size] [size=1][color=lightgreen]Ported to the MI format by: [/color][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/users/71678078][b]Amichai-Oz Yannai[/b][/url][/size] [size=1][color=lightgreen]Splitting and Modularization: [/color][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/users/32262030][b]LinkHero95[/b][/url][/size]
